resources.string: Sacrifice loyal minion to cause explosion. Explosion area will depend on servant remaining health and your skill level.
You have no power over me!
Select your loyal servant to sacrifice!

Opening tomb is sinister act by itself, but not enough for someone serving Death itself. Performer of this Dark Ritual have a great chance (and it will grow with performer mastery) to subdue poor soul of one lying here.
There is no grave here to perform an Exhumation.
Attempt to raise latest (Ritual require quite fresh material) slain creature. When using this dark art remember: almost any creature can be raised, but not everyone will is easy to bend.
Raise Dead failed because there is no free space nearby.
You need to kill someone before attempt to raise it.
Raw fish, eat at your own risk
Frozen fish, looks like it alive, but frozen.
